item.title: [2212 W1] [Reflection] Drive
item.description: Daily Briefs 221205: No Situational Change to Report (NSTR). Reserved tickets etc. to get my military uniform for the Minister of Science and ICT Award ceremony tomorrow. Got my Indonesia E-Visa, and waiting for my leave to get approved.

item.title: [221204] [Reflection] Way Forward
item.description: Today’s Song Get away from their unkindness But this time we should run together You don’t have to worry or hide \ ‘Cause I get you with my heart - 백예린의 “Popo” 중 Today’s Reflections More Jobs Applied to more jobs! - Mostly Banking and VCs :) Got an online interview offer from one!! Yay!! Making progress Bleached World Difficult to maintain my composure in the face of other’s success I’m still a nobody, at least for now.

item.title: [221203] [Reflection] Success, but not quite.
item.description: Today’s Song Yesterday my life was duller Now everything’s technicolor Hey Now - Hillary Duff의 “What Dreams Are Made Of” 중 Today’s Reflections Accepted to three positions this week! Representative of South Korea at the EAS Hackathon Accepted to the Founders Program, a 5 University-Joint Startup Conference (SKY+KP) Recommended as KAIST SW Academy Teacher Heptic, as there are many things to figure out in order to leave the country. Including buying tickets, reservign hotels, alloting time of leave, etc.

item.title: [221130] [Reflection] Eternal Flame
item.description: Today’s Song Do you understand? Do you feel the same? Am I only dreaming? Is this burning an eternal flame? I believe it’s meant to be, darling -The Bangles의 “Eternal Flames” 중 Today’s Goal Do Even More Job Applications plz.. (Kakao, Yanolja, ) Complete CFA Ch. 2 Do some programming! (> 1 hr plz..) [O] 2030 Reflection & Exercise Time Today’s Reflection Happy day, but didn’t achieve my goals as I was too preocupied of stuffs…

item.title: [221128] [Reflection] Guilty Pleasure
item.description: Today’s Goal Do More Job Applications plz.. [-] CFA Ch. 2 [O] Watch movie with Tobin Manage this week’s plan (very heptic :( ) [O] Tuesday, Friday meetup [O] Friday Pass + Leave Start [O] Submit leave for 06 DEC [O] Ask for special leave Awaiting results… (EAS, Founders, Job Application) [O] 2030 Reflection & Exercise Time Today’s Reflection Seek for a crew for exercising. Good to provide motivation and stuff.

item.title: [221127] [Reflection] ANTIFRAGILE
item.description: Today’s Song 더 높이 가줄게 내가 바랐던 세계 젤 위에 (ah-ah) 떨어져도 돼 I’m anti-fragile, anti-fragile (ah-ah) - 르세라핌의 “ANTIFRAGILE” 중 Today’s Goal CFA SN Ch.1 M1.3 & Ch.2 M2.1 ~ 2.3 Do job application, plz… A Tour of C++, Ch.1 ~ 3 Exercise and Reflection time @ 2030 ~ 2200 Establish a day-to-day, week-to-week plan for the next several months

item.title: [221126] Goals
item.description: On my learning Programming C++ [NOV 22] A Tour of C++ [DEC 22] Effective Modern C++ [DEC 23] C++ Templates [JAN 23] C++ Concurrency in Action [JAN 23] Functional Programming in C++ Algorithms 1 Problem / Day (LeetCode & 백준) [Until ETS] Introduction to Algorithms System [~ FEB 23] Operating System Concepts [~ FEB 23] CS:APP CFA Test Date: 18 MAY 23 Study 2 chapters every 3 days Study 4 chapters every week (1 day freebie) Consulting Foundation Study MATH!

item.title: [221126] [Reflection] Fragile
item.description: Today’s Song All the colors and personalities you can’t see right through what I truly am you’re hurting me without noticing I’m so, so broke like someone just robbed me - 백예린의 “Square” 중 Today’s Goal Founders 2기 면접 @ 1930, 서울 마포 Complete Job Application for: Bain, LG, Yanolja CFA SN Ch.1 & Ch.2 Polish Blog Today’s Achievements End of interview for Founders; results out on 30 NOV. Decent quality, but stuttered and wasn’t specific enough, as there were some challenging questions.

item.title: [221125] [Reflection] 시작
item.description: Today’s Song 지금 나를 위한 약속 멈추지 않겠다고 또 하나를 앞지르면 곧 너의 뒤를 따라잡겠지 - 가호의 “시작” Today’s Goal Create a Blog to record learnings · memories · milestones Exercise for an hour Prepare for job interviews and think about leave forms Today’s Learning A Tour of C++, Ch. 1 CFA Schwester Notes Ch.1 For Tomorrow Establish a solid future plan (learning · way forward · life) A Tour of C++, Ch.

item.title: Gu Hong Min (민거홍)
item.description: Educator; Programmer; Innovator Gu Hong (Kevin) Min wants to innovate education with technology. He has over nine years of experience as an educator, and has worked with various companies, government associations, and universities to create enlightening courses. Now, he wants to do more. Through convergence of technology and education, he plans to reach a wider audience, and make a significant impact to the world. Education Georgia Tech (~ 2025 (est.)) B.
